name: Sushi Belt
description:
Make sushi and feed it to customers using the innovative technology of conveyor belts!

Controls: 

  1. Arrow keys to move around the kitchen. Bump into the counter space to pickup ingredients (red fish, white rice, greens seaweed), read the recipe book (lower right), or discard into the sink (lower left). 
  2. 🅾️ to drop item on the floor.
  3. You can carry up to 3 items!

Sushi Crafting: 

Every plate requires a specific combination of ingredients to make (order does not matter). To make sushi place three ingredients on the makisu (sushi mat), whereupon it will be turned into the corresponding sushi (or if you don't know the recipe yet, poop).

The game is played over a work week, each day unlocking a new recipe and customers wanting that dish.

Made for Fantasy Console Jam 4 in a week.
